node.address: Calle del Carretero 10b 56, Getsemani , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
We offer you shared rooms and private rooms.

The hostel is located in the most emblematic sector of Cartagena, Getsemani. 20m from the Plaza de la Trinidad, a square full of life, culture and joy.

Situated within less than 1 km of San Felipe de Barajas Castle and 2.2 km of Cartagena's Walls, Dora Hostel features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Cartagena de Indias. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Bolivar Park is 2.6 km away.
At the hostel, the rooms come with a patio.
A continental breakfast is available each morning at Dora Hostel.

Cartagena's Gold Museum is 2.6 km from the accommodation, while Palace of the Inquisition is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 6 km from Dora Hostel.
Getsemani is a great choice for travellers interested in nightlife, culture and architecture.

description.description: The patio, with its hammocks and open kitchen, invites you to share with other travelers and spend an excellent time with us! Come to Dora Hostel and see for yourself! Dora Hostel is located in the most emblematic sector of Cartagena, Getsemani. 20m from the Plaza de la Trinidad, a square full of life, culture and joy.
